MIB Fees
MIB charges a fee of $25.00 for making the records search, and the fee
must
be paid by the claimant.
Important
:Â  MIB cannot guarantee that its records will be acceptable to the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) as proof of eligibility for VA benefits, nor can MIB guarantee that any records pertaining to the Veteran's wartime service are actually on file.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B - Obtaining Merchant Marine Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B
